mapper.select: select no, customer_no, employee_no, content, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') as reg_date, title from consult where employee_no=#{employeeNo} order by reg_date desc
select no, customer_no, employee_no, content, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') as reg_date, title from consult where customer_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into consult(no, customer_no, employee_no, content, reg_date, title) values(#{no}, #{customerNo}, #{employeeNo}, #{content}, to_date(#{regDate},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi'), #{title})
insert into consult_product(no, consult_no, type, product_no) values(consult_product_seq.nextval, #{consultNo}, #{type}, #{productNo})
mapper.update: update consult set content=#{content}, title=#{title} where no=#{no}
update consult_product set type=#{type}, product_no=#{productNo} where consult_no=#{consultNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from consult where employee_no=#{employeeNo} and to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm')
